meanings.sent1: The harsh chemicals can necrotize the skin if not handled carefully.
meanings.sent2: If left untreated, the infected tissue will necrotize and die.
meanings.sent3: The careless gardener accidentally necrotized the plant by overwatering it.
meanings.sent4: The neglect of regular maintenance can slowly necrotize a once vibrant neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The venom of the snake had the power to necrotize the flesh upon contact.

meanings.sent1: Without proper blood flow, the tissue will necrotize and become blackened.
meanings.sent2: The injured cells will necrotize if not supplied with enough oxygen.
meanings.sent3: The abandoned building seemed to necrotize over time, crumbling away.
meanings.sent4: The toxic relationship began to necrotize her sense of self-worth.
meanings.sent5: The lack of sunlight caused the plant to necrotize and wither away.
